title: Neil Diamond Sells Music Catalog, Recording Rights to Universal Music Group
sub_head: Singer’s deal is latest in a string of artists selling their work, as value of royalty revenue from music rights climbs
body:
Neil Diamond sold his song catalog and recording rights to Universal Music Group , the latest deal of musicians selling their portfolios.
The company, which didn’t disclose the value of the deal, said the pact includes rights to all recordings from Mr. Diamond’s career, 110 unreleased tracks and an unreleased album. Universal’s publishing division has been Mr. Diamond’s publishing administrator for several years.
